snippet: Rafael Nadal, aiming to end Novak Djokovic’s run of 100 weeks at the top of the ATP ranking, beat Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-4, 7-6 (3), to move into the third round of the China Open in Beijing.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, aiming to end Novak Djokovic’s run of 100 weeks at the top of the ATP ranking, beat Philipp Kohlschreiber, 6-4, 7-6 (3), to move into the third round of the China Open in Beijing.

headline.main: Nadal on Track for No. 1 Spot
headline.print_headline: Nadal on Track for No. 1 Spot
